Certainly! However, I don't have details about case CASE-287 from the data provided. If you could provide more information about this case, I can help draft a response letter. If it resembles case CASE-143 in any way, here is a generic example:

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

[Your Law Firm]

---

Feel free to provide more specific details or instructions if you need a more tailored letter.

Request: Draft a response letter to opposing counsel in case CASE-287
llm_calls.response:
Subject: Response to Case Inquiry

Dear [Opposing Counsel's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing in regard to our ongoing correspondence concerning the case you referenced as CASE-287. However, it appears there may be some confusion regarding the case number. Our records currently reflect details related to CASE-4772-313336.

Could you please verify the correct case number at your earliest convenience? This will ensure that we address your inquiry accurately and efficiently. Once confirmed, I will be more than happy to assist you further and provide any necessary information or documentation related to the case.

Thank you for your cooperation and understanding. Please feel free to contact me directly at [Your Phone Number] or [Your Email Address] if you need any immediate assistance.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,

[Your Full Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Law Firm/Company Name]  
[Contact Information]
